title: TOXIC FUME HAZARD
fullText: All battery system types categorized as toxic fume hazard shall have a sign: "Danger, toxic fumes". The sign shall specify the specific fault condition (e.g. fire) under which the fumes will be present. This sign shall also include PPE requirements for entering the room/working with the battery systems. This sign shall be mounted either adjacent to the enclosure or on all doors to the room where the battery system is located.
